title: nadha hare
language:
Sanskrit







slOkam

adha thAm ganthum asakthAm
 chiram anurakthAm lathA gruhE drushtvA
 thachcharitham gOvindE manasijamandhE
 sakhI prAha

1
 pasyathi disi disi rahasai bhavantham
 thwadhadhara madhura madhooni pibantham
sahitya:
NAdha harE jagannAdha harE
 Seedhathi rAdhA vAsa gruhE
 
2
 thwathabhisaraNa rabhasEna valanthee
 pathathi padhAni kiyanthi chalanth


3




 vihitha visadhabisa kisalaya valayA
 jeevathi paramiha thavarathi kalayA

4

 muhurava lOkitha maNdana leelA
 madhuripuraham ithi bhAvana seelA
 

5

 thwaritham upaithina kadhamapi sAram
 haririthi vadhathi sakheem anuvAram

6

 slishyathi chumbathi jaladhara kalpam
 harirupagatha ithi thimiram analpam

7

 bhavathi viLambini vigaLitha lajjA
 vilapathi rOdhithi vAsaka sajjA

8

 sree jayadEva kavEridhamudhitham
 rasika janam thanuthAm athimudhitham
